miniloto_desc: Mini Loto: Pick 5 out of 31 numbers
switch_loto_type: Switch using the lottery type buttons above!
tell_me_if_win: "Let me know if you win!" by Tonari
auto_fetch_hint: Select a draw to automatically fetch predictions.
must_select_loto: Please make sure to select the correct draw for the selected lotto.
pwa_guide_iphone: iPhone (Safari): Tap the 'Share' button at the bottom → 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa_guide_android: Android (Chrome): Tap the '︙' menu in the upper right → 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa_guide_pc: PC (Chrome): Use the 'Install' button at the right of the address bar to install as an app
pwa_icon_access: You can access it anytime from the home screen icon just like an app.
pwa_auto_update: * As a PWA, updates are applied automatically.
auto_results: Latest Loto draw results are fetched and updated automatically.
all_free_features: All original features like 'Tonari Zubari Prediction', 'Tonari Diagnosis', and 'Past Results Tool' are free to use.
no_ads_no_account: No ads, no account required. Anyone can use it safely.
accuracy_note: All app data and analytics results are cross-checked with official draw CSVs to ensure top accuracy.
disclaimer:
* This service is provided for data verification and entertainment purposes.
Please make purchase decisions based on your own judgment and responsibility.
blog: Tonari Official Blog (See trends & in-depth predictions here)
note: Tonari Note (Deep insights & paid predictions here)
youtube: Tonari Official YouTube Channel (Also streaming videos!)
過去30回で未出現の数字から抽出: Selected from numbers not appeared in the last 30 draws
直近30回で出現頻度が高い数字から抽出: Selected from numbers frequently appeared in the last 30 draws
奇数が多い構成（ミニロト・ロト6:4個以上, ロト7:5個以上）: More odd numbers (Mini Loto/Loto6: 4 or more, Loto7: 5 or more)
偶数が多い構成（ミニロト・ロト6:4個以上, ロト7:5個以上）: More even numbers (Mini Loto/Loto6: 4 or more, Loto7: 5 or more)
下一桁が同じ数字（例:11,21など）が複数含まれる: Includes numbers with the same last digit (e.g. 11, 21, etc.)
最大ゾーン（例：ロト6は31〜43など）多め: More from the highest zone (e.g. Loto6: 31–43)
各ゾーンから最低1つは必ず選ぶ: At least one from each zone
最小～最大のレンジが小さい構成: Small range between smallest and largest number
最小～最大のレンジが大きい構成: Large range between smallest and largest number
前回当選数字と1つ以上重複: At least one number overlaps with previous winning numbers
前回当選数字と1つも重複しない: No numbers overlap with previous winning numbers
合計値が小さい構成（しきい値は種別で変わる）: Low total sum (threshold varies by type)
合計値が大きい構成（しきい値は種別で変わる）: High total sum (threshold varies by type)
上のロト種ボタンで切替えられるよ！: Switch using the lottery type buttons above!
「当たったら教えてね！」by となり: "Let me know if you win!" by Tonari
